A recent encounter with a renowned actress, now deceased, left a lasting impression on a witness. Two years prior to her passing, the individual had the privilege of witnessing her portrayal of Mary Anne in the play "Merivaux". The illusion of her character was so convincing that it transcended her physical limitations, a true masterclass in acting. This encounter serves as a poignant reminder of the power of the performing arts to transcend time and circumstance, leaving a lasting impact on those who are fortunate enough to experience it.
